name: Siphoning Touch
prereq: Spell Trickster Dedication; Ability To Cast Vampiric Touch
summary: When you cast vampiric touch, you can modify its standard effects as follows: Instead of gaining the temporary Hit Points yourself, you can grant the temporary Hit Points to an ally within 30 feet.
description:
When you cast vampiric touch, you can modify its standard effects as follows: Instead of gaining the temporary Hit Points yourself, you can grant the temporary Hit Points to an ally within 30 feet. After 1 minute, the ally loses any of these temporary Hit Points that remain.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
